urls.title: ECDC signs memorandum of understanding with Korea Disease Control and Prevention Agency
urls.description: On 13 December 2021, during a virtual event, Dr. Andrea Ammon, Director of the European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) and Mr. Heon Joo Kim, Vice Commissioner of the Korea Disease Control and Prevention Agency (KDCA) signed a memorandum of understanding (MoU) between the two agencies.

tweets.text:
Tighter cooperation with Korea CDC!

During a virtual event today, #ECDC Director - Dr. Andrea Ammon and Mr. Heon Joo Kim - Vice Commissioner of the Korea Disease Control and Prevention Agency (#KDCA) signed a memorandum of understanding.
 
Read more: https://t.co/avxwFELCJH https://t.co/jIwdSWszmP

The objective is to deepen and expand the technical collaboration between #ECDC & #KDCA on matters in the field of communicable disease control and prevention, with a focus on health security. This will be achieved through information exchange & increased collaboration. https://t.co/hx6ZNFEd6T
